about.description:
Discover quick and convenient access to information about Coworking Metz and its services.

Whether you want to check available spaces, find out about upcoming events, or access the location, everything is at your fingertips!

By the way, is English suitable for you?
about.headline: In your pocket
about.title: Le Poulailler

activity.description:
To anticipate the availability of the open space, which is open from 7 am to 11 pm, track the real-time number of coworkers present and check forecasts for the upcoming hours and days.

Your personal history, as well as the details of your subscription and tickets, are also available at a glance.
activity.headline: From yesterday, today, and tomorrow
activity.title: Check activity

events.description:
Access the complete calendar of upcoming events, organized by the association or by Bliiida.
And don't forget to take a look at the lunch offered by Amour Food.

You won't miss any opportunities to meet new people and have memorable experiences!
events.title: Stay connected

services.description:
Whether on foot, by bike, or by car, you have full control to access the place. Open the parking gate or unlock the pedestrian entrance whenever you want.

And because we like to offer you options, you can also personalize your experience.
Which ambiance do you prefer?
services.title: Come as you please
